bug.short_desc: there are no links to RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-primary in /etc/pki/rpm-gpg
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
[lnie@localhost rpm-gpg]$ sudo ll | grep 25 lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 29 Jul 27 03:49 RPM-GPG-KEY-25-fedora -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-primary -rw-r--r--. 1 root root 1670 Jul 27 03:49 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-primary -rw-r--r--. 1 root root 3132 Jul 27 03:49 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-secondary
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): f25-x86_64-20160807(workstaion live,server-dvd)
How reproducible: always
Steps to Reproduce: 1.do a default installation with workstation live or server dvd 2.boot the newly installed system 3.check /etc/pki/rpm-gpg
Actual results:
Expected results:
Additional info: workstation-netinst is not affected.

Was fixed in fedora-repos-25-0.5
lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 31 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-aarch64 -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-secondary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 29 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-armhfp -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-primary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 29 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-i386 -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-primary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 31 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-ppc64 -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-secondary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 31 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-ppc64le -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-secondary -rw-r--r--. 1 root root 1657 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-primary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 31 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-s390x -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-secondary -rw-r--r--. 1 root root 3128 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-secondary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 29 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-x86_64 -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-24-primary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 31 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-aarch64 -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-secondary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 29 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-armhfp -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-primary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 29 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-i386 -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-primary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 31 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-ppc64 -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-secondary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 31 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-ppc64le -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-secondary -rw-r--r--. 1 root root 1670 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-primary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 31 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-s390x -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-secondary -rw-r--r--. 1 root root 3132 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-secondary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 29 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-x86_64 -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-primary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 31 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-26-aarch64 -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-26-secondary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 29 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-26-armhfp -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-26-primary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 29 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-26-i386 -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-26-primary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 31 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-26-ppc64 -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-26-secondary lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 31 Aug 8 13:13 RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-26-ppc64le -> RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-26-secondary

I have updated fedora-repos to the latest version,but it seems that there are still some signature problems which interrupt most(I have tried many,the success number is zero) packages' installation progress. [lnie@localhost rpm-gpg]$ rpm -q fedora-repos fedora-repos-25-0.5.noarch [lnie@localhost rpm-gpg]$ sudo dnf install net-snmp ... Delta RPMs reduced 2.6 MB of updates to 1.9 MB (26.1% saved) The downloaded packages were saved in cache until the next successful transaction. You can remove cached packages by executing 'dnf clean packages'. Error: Package lm_sensors-libs-3.4.0-5.fc25.x86_64.rpm is not signed [root@localhost rpm-gpg]# dnf install xchat Last metadata expiration check: 1:42:43 ago on Tue Aug 16 08:31:34 2016. Dependencies resolved. ... Total 613 kB/s | 6.9 MB 00:11 The downloaded packages were saved in cache until the next successful transaction. You can remove cached packages by executing 'dnf clean packages'. Error: Package xchat-2.8.8-32.fc25.x86_64.rpm is not signed
[lnie@localhost rpm-gpg]$ sudo dnf install tor Last metadata expiration check: 1:57:42 ago on Tue Aug 16 08:31:34 2016. Dependencies resolved. ... Total 360 kB/s | 2.1 MB 00:06 warning: /var/cache/dnf/fedora-310f9d37d74ceec1/packages/tor-0.2.7.6-6.fc24.x86_64.rpm: Header V3 RSA/SHA256 Signature, key ID 81b46521: NOKEY Importing GPG key 0xFDB19C98: Userid : "Fedora 25 Primary (25) <fedora-25-primary@fedoraproject.org>" Fingerprint: C437 DCCD 558A 66A3 7D6F 4372 4089 D8F2 FDB1 9C98 From : /etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-x86_64 Is this ok [y/N]: y Key imported successfully Import of key(s) didn't help, wrong key(s)? The downloaded packages were saved in cache until the next successful transaction. You can remove cached packages by executing 'dnf clean packages'. Error: Public key for tor-0.2.7.6-6.fc24.x86_64.rpm is not installedFailing package is: tor-0.2.7.6-6.fc24.x86_64 GPG Keys are configured as: file:///etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-fedora-25-x86_64

So, we only had a full compose with everything signed last night.
So, it should have sycned out to most mirrors overnight.
So, hopefully this will go away today/moving forward.
